name: Drawn Out (DrinkingKvasir)
description:
Breif

We are excited to present you with a norse-themed asyncroness autobattler card game where you are tasked with drafting the best deck you can. Battling all the other ludumdrees who dare to give it a shot!

Simple explanation

The cards do what is written on them, try to build decks with usable synergies to go futher.

Each card has a turn to attack, if there are cards on the opponents side they will always attack them. If there are no card on your opponents side the card attack the opponent directly.

The dice at the top and bottom represents your and your opponents life, if your dice go to zero you lose the bout. when you lose a bout you have one of the three coins that you have to waiger taken from you.

If you still have coins when your gbout is over will we face a new opponent and their nefarious creation.

If you lose all your coins your run is over and you lose.

Your deck will still be avaliable to be played against of course.

Controlls

Cards are interacted with using the mouse.

Left click is select or accept and right click is go back.

Holding space speeds up the simulation.

Ecs brings up the pause menu.
